doc.field: Series XXIII: Pride and Progress / The Right Stuff
Series XXIII: Pride and Progress / The Right Stuff
[1]--Pride and Progress, Episode No. 17 [2]--The Right Stuff, Episode No. 193 [Air Date: 4/23/1986]
[1]--Pride and Progress, Episode No. 17 [2]--The Right Stuff, Episode No. 193 [Air Date: 4/23/1986]

Pride and ProgressNews-highlights:1. Catholic theologian Charles Curran warned by Vatican for support of homosexuals2. Sacramento city passes Gay Rights Bill3. Indiana legislature kills several anti-gay bills4. Fundraiser held to repeal the Texas sodomy law5. Possible AIDS vaccine's effect on search for a cureCOMMERCIAL: Commodore Plus 46. Rules governing the election of delegates in 1988 Democratic Convention changed to specifically include gays7. Vermont rejects anti-discrimination move against gays by landlords8. Gay Health Report: Study on course of HTLV infection, oral sex's riskiness, accommodation for gays visiting an Australia regattaCOMMERCIAL: "New York Native" with Quentin Crisp9. Outreach: Conversations with GMHC: Stash Santoro discusses GMHC's buddy program for those dying of AIDS10. Sports Report, from Bowlmor Lanes11. Closing credits
The Right Stuff:1. This Week in Gay History with Jeff BixbyCOMMERCIAL: E-Z trim exercise equipment2. Cabaret Beat, clips from a performanceCOMMERCIAL: The Monster3. Interview with director Rosa von Praunheim about "A Virus Knows no Morals"COMMERCIAL: "The Gascon" by John Colin Penford4. Dramatic reading of "More Lies" by Hektor MunozCOMMERCIAL: Jack Albertson for the Fund for Human Dignity5. Review of the play "Immortal" by Felice PicanoCOMMERCIAL: Koos Fashion storeCOMMERCIAL: Michael Greer show announcement6. Book Reviews: Gay/Lesbian Almanac by Jonathan Katz, Byron and Greek Love by Louis Crompton, Ganymede in the Renaissance by James Saslow, White Trash Cooking by Ernest Mickler
[1]--Pride and Progress, Episode No. 17 [2]--The Right Stuff, Episode No. 193 [Air Date: 4/23/1986]: April 1986
